prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a playful personality and a sleek, aquatic body.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a floating creature with soft, round features and gentle colors.
Generate a Pokemon design that incorporates elements of both ocean life and cute, cuddly aesthetics.
Show me a mythical water Pokemon that evolves from a smaller, basic form and has unique swimming abilities.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments and has a soothing presence in battle.
Design a cute, blue Pokemon that can glide through water effortlessly and has long, flowing fins.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the sea, with a charming smile and friendly demeanor.
